channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [OGNL-4] Error when using TokenSessionStoreInterceptor in webwork
item.description:

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Need a real issue describing the full problem. At least enough of one that a test case could verify what is happening.
